channel.title: [PI[how to make player rights[PI]
channel.description: alright so i am trying to make a certain player right (mod,admin,owner etc) have a certain right (mute,ban,mypos,xtele, etc) but i have a donor rank so i dont want it to interfere with it, i have this like substring(5) or something im confused iv added developer and its playerights are 5 and it doesnt have all the rights as the owner. the other player right is 6 same as the owner if this is confusing im sorry i just really need help. thanks.
